Player

Class MusicLibrary

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player.MusicLibrary

  • public class MusicLibrary
extends java.lang.Object
    Music Library class, contains an array of Mp3 objects.
    Author:
    Group 25

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.ArrayList<Mp3> mp3List
      ArrayList of Mp3 objects.
      private java.lang.String name
      Name given to this MusicLibrary instance.
      private int nextSongId
      The next integer to be applied to the next song imported, to help keep Mp3 instances organized and identifiable.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MusicLibrary(java.lang.String listName)
      MusicLibrary constructor, initiates mp3List, nextSongId, and name values to defaults (empty, 1, and the input listName String, respectively).

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addSong(java.lang.String filePath)
      Creates an Mp3 instance and adds it to the mp3List array.
      Mp3 getMp3ById(int id)
      Returns the Mp3 object out of mp3List referenced by the integer id given as input.
      int getMp3Index(Mp3 needle)
      Returns the index of a specified Mp3 instance.
      java.util.ArrayList<Mp3> getMp3List()
      Returns this MusicLibrary's mp3List.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns MusicLibrary's name value.
      java.lang.Object[][] getSongListInfo()
      Returns all track information from the mp3List as a double-array object, for display purposes.
      void printMp3List()
      Prints the titles of all Mp3 objects in the mp3List.
      void sortPlaylist()
      Sorts the mp3List based on upvote count.
      int totalUpvotes()
      Returns the total number of upvotes.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • name

        private java.lang.String name
        Name given to this MusicLibrary instance. Utterly useless and unnecessary, but whatev's.

      • mp3List

        private java.util.ArrayList<Mp3> mp3List
        ArrayList of Mp3 objects.

      • nextSongId

        private int nextSongId
        The next integer to be applied to the next song imported, to help keep Mp3 instances organized and identifiable.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MusicLibrary

        public MusicLibrary(java.lang.String listName)
        MusicLibrary constructor, initiates mp3List, nextSongId, and name values to defaults (empty, 1, and the input listName String, respectively).
        Parameters:
        listName - Name to be applied to the MusicLibrary.

    • Method Detail

      • addSong

        public void addSong(java.lang.String filePath)
        Creates an Mp3 instance and adds it to the mp3List array.
        Parameters:
        filePath - String path to the mp3 we want to add.

      • totalUpvotes

        public int totalUpvotes()
        Returns the total number of upvotes. (Previous comment: "this is dumb". Agreed. Yet, we use this somewhere in MusicPlayerFrame. Why? I'll figure that out later, but, for now, this is staying.)
        Returns:
        Total number of upvotes on all Mp3 instances in the mp3List.

      • getMp3List

        public java.util.ArrayList<Mp3> getMp3List()
        Returns this MusicLibrary's mp3List.
        Returns:
        This MusicLibrary's mp3List.

      • getMp3Index

        public int getMp3Index(Mp3 needle)
        Returns the index of a specified Mp3 instance.
        Parameters:
        needle - The Mp3 to be found out of the haystack.
        Returns:
        The index in the mp3List array of the Mp3 instance given. -1 if not found.

      • getMp3ById

        public Mp3 getMp3ById(int id)
        Returns the Mp3 object out of mp3List referenced by the integer id given as input.
        Parameters:
        id - Integer identifier that *should* be specific to one of the Mp3 instances in mp3List.
        Returns:
        Mp3 instance referenced by id input value. If not found, returns null.

      • getSongListInfo

        public java.lang.Object[][] getSongListInfo()
        Returns all track information from the mp3List as a double-array object, for display purposes.
        Returns:
        Double-array of Mp3 metadata. If none, returns null.

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns MusicLibrary's name value.
        Returns:
        String name of this MusicLibrary.

      • sortPlaylist

        public void sortPlaylist()
        Sorts the mp3List based on upvote count. Praise Allah for overrides.

      • printMp3List

        public void printMp3List()
        Prints the titles of all Mp3 objects in the mp3List. Useful for debuggin' purposes.
